title: N172 Old Judge Latham - St Louis - sliding
author: ramram

posts.post_title: N172 Old Judge Latham - St Louis - sliding
posts.post_content:
Nice sliding pose of Latham.  Card is a little light but a good looking card for the grade. $xxx shipped or trade for a K.C. Old Judge player.

Rob M.
